DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study follow : - To evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) orally administer tafamidis Japanese Western healthy volunteer single dose . - To compare Japanese Western PK profile . - Determine PD stabilization effect tafamidis human transthyretin ( TTR ) validate ex vivo assay .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Single Doses Of PF-06291826 ( Tafamidis ) In Japanese And Western Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 . Pregnant nursing female . Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception .
